decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: Location Plan; Block Plans; 01 (Volumes); 02 (Ground and First Floor Plans); 03 (Loft Floor and Roof Plans); 04 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 05 (Proposed Loft Floor Plan); 06 (Elevations); 07 (Side Elevations); 08 (Sections).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved two rooflights to front roof slope shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the character of the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).

| The Juliet balcony identified in the approved drawings listed in condition 2 shall be retained in perpetuity and no access shall be formed onto the flat roof of the existing outrigger, unless otherwise agreed with the Local Planning Authority through the submission of a planning application.
Reason: To protect neighbouring amenities, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
description: Rear roof extension to main roofslope incorporating Juliet balcony; roof extension to rear outrigger; and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
